item.title: 10 Health Benefits of Playing Video Games
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Video games have been a popular form of entertainment for decades, but they are often criticized for being a sedentary activity that can lead to health problems. However, recent research has shown that playing video games can actually have a number of health benefits. Here are ten health benefits of playing video games: Improved Cognitive...
